page.title: 15Rural Transport.
page.content: In parts of our area it is very difficult to travel unless you own a car. If you live in Worleston,Poole or Aston Juxta Mondrum then you can only catch a bus on Tuesdays or Thursdays, and then there are only two on each of those days.On Thursdays the buses are very busy because it is market day in Nantwich and all the old age pensioners come into town to get their money and to do their shopping. In the south east of the area the buses run every hour, but this service is mostly used by people going from Crewe to Nantwich and it only operates in three out of our twelve blocks. A lot of people have problems because there aren't enough buses. People find it very difficult to get to work if they don't have a car. Children can not get to the swimming baths or to the sports centres.
